column5: Started bright and early with Chuck and headed right to the deep....easy walk and we found plenty of ice. Even snowmobiles were running around. It was mainly lakers day....one after another....got 7-8 of them (all released) while trying to get my second whitie....oh well...not complaining as first day on Simcoe for the big boys 2 lakers and a whitie is not bad...Chuck got 2 lakers as well. Meegs and Williams did all the damage. Had great company on the ice and a succesful day...what can one ask for?!? With temps between -20 and -30 next week it should make for a great ice and long ice fishing season  Here is what we've kept:    Cheers, Ice Fisherman
Sounds like a great day out there.  Nice fish as well.
Good going guys!  Great catch.......... im just itching to get out there!  Hopefully this week
nice job. this full moon was awesome
Good Job Emil  I was too afraid to go to laker territory today.  Maybe next weekend or the weekend after.  Joey
Lovely Haul!  Theres a supper or two!
damn fine first day . nice lookin' fish .
Cool looking Pic ....   Man ,, Wheres Lake Simcoe   Everybody is laying a beating on the whities and Lakers

It was  good day with great company....Fish had by all and good weather to boot.Great start to a new season......Now if we could just find those damn whities.....lol.....TC and tight lines all......Chuck.....
nice going guys I hope to get into them soon myself
Emil  You and Chuck had a GREAT day, For Sure!!!  The Ice is getting better every Day.  Rick
Great first outing,  nice haul   Keep 'em coming!
good to see you out there Emil! ...   Chuck..  dude, hows the head???   was definately a fun day out there!
Great report and pic Icefisherman I'd say that's a fantastic start     Congratulations to you guys  Thanks for sharing Leechman
Nice shootin, Emil.  Your report is making me a little itchy.

Nice to see you and chuck out there Emil. Was a good day for sure. Hope the knock on yer noggin didnt do any harm there Chuck. Pondo said he could hear yer head hitting the ice HARD!!!.... One reason why I quit skatting......  CYA out there again soon.
